column1: #Text=Europe is NOT failing refugees, it has accepted hundreds of thousands!
#Text=They are being expected to do too much.
#Text=Instead of continually trying to depose Assad, the West should be trying to stabilise Syria and its neighbouring countries so that Syrians can begin to go home.
#Text=The millions of refugees in Jordan, Lebanon and Turkey cannot be held there in camps forever and neither can they all be absorbed around the world.
#Text=More refugees need to be accepted but Syria and its neighbours need to be fixed too.
